languages.text: "Ты прав{mf||а}. Владайм Токара, ты признан виновным. В наказание суд назначает тебе пожизненную епитимью. Ты и твои приспешники будете зачислены в штрафной абордажный отряд на борту моего флагмана. В нем вы будете сражаться с врагами Человечества до самой смерти".

"You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}. Владайм Токара, ты признан виновным. В наказание суд назначает тебе пожизненную епитимью. Ты и твои приспешники будете зачислены в штрафной абордажный отряд на борту моего флагмана. В нем вы будете сражаться с врагами Человечества до самой смерти".

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your henchpeople will be enrolled in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you will be fighting enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

"You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your henchpeople will be enrolled in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you will be fighting enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

"You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your henchpeople will be enrolled in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you will be fighting enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

"You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your henchpeople will be enrolled in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you will be fighting enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

"You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

"You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

languages.text: “你说得没错。弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，本法庭宣判你有罪，命令你终生忏悔。你和你的手下将会被编入我的旗舰的判罪登船队。身为判罪小队的一员，你的余生将会在与人类之敌的战斗中度过。”
languages.original_text: "You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错。弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，本法庭宣判你有罪，命令你终生忏悔。你和你的手下将会被编入我的旗舰的判罪登船队。身为判罪小队的一员，你的余生将会在与人类之敌的战斗中度过。”

languages.text: 「お前は正しい、ヴラダイム・トカラ。すなわち、お前は有罪だ。法廷はお前に終身刑の判決を下す。お前と側近たちは、私の旗艦の流刑搭乗部隊に登録される。その部隊の一員として、お前は生涯、人類の敵と戦うことになる」
languages.original_text: "You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は正しい、ヴラダイム・トカラ。お前は有罪だ。法廷はお前に終身刑の判決を下す。お前と子分たちは、私の旗艦の流刑搭乗部隊に登録される。その部隊の一員として、お前は生涯、人類の敵と戦うことになる」

languages.text: «Tiene razón. Vladaym Tocara, queda usted declarado culpable. El tribunal le condena a una vida de penitencia. Tanto usted como sus socios serán alistados en un escuadrón de abordaje penal que operará desde mi nave insignia. Como parte de ese escuadrón, luchará contra los enemigos de la Humanidad durante el resto de sus días».
languages.original_text: "You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. Vladaym Tocara, es usted declarado culpable. El tribunal le condena a una vida de penitencia. Tanto usted como sus secuaces serán alistados en un escuadrón de abordaje penal que operará desde mi nave insignia. Como parte de ese escuadrón, luchará contra enemigos de la humanidad durante el resto de sus días».

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Vladaym Tocara, Ihr werdet hiermit für schuldig befunden. Das Gericht verurteilt Euch zu lebenslanger Strafe. Ihr und Eure Komplizen, Ihr werdet einem Straftrupp zugewiesen, der von meinem Flaggschiff aus operiert und feindliche Schiffe entert. Als Teil dieses Trupps werdet Ihr den Rest Eures Lebens gegen Feinde der Menschheit kämpfen."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Vladaym Tocara, Ihr werdet für schuldig befunden. Das Gericht verurteilt Euch zu lebenslanger Strafe. Ihr und Eure Schergen, Ihr werdet einem Straftrupp zugewiesen, der von meinem Flaggschiff aus operiert und feindliche Schiffe entert. Als Teil dieses Trupps werdet Ihr den Rest Eures Lebens gegen Feinde der Menschheit kämpfen."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Vladaym Tocara, vous êtes reconnu coupable et la cour vous condamne à la pénitence à perpétuité. Vos complices et vous serez enrôlés dans une escouade carcérale d'abordage opérant depuis mon vaisseau et combattrez les ennemis de l'humanité jusqu'à la fin de vos jours. »
languages.original_text: "You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Vladaym Tocara, vous êtes reconnu coupable et la cour vous condamne à la pénitence à perpétuité. Vous et vos comparses serez enrôlés dans une escouade carcérale d'abordage opérant depuis mon vaisseau et combattrez les ennemis de l'humanité jusqu'à la fin de vos jours. »

languages.text: "Haklısın. Vladaym Tocara, suçlu olduğuna hükmediyorum. Mahkeme seni ömür boyu cezaya çarptırıyor. Sen ve takipçilerin, uçsuz gemimde faaliyet gösteren bir cezai bordalama mangasına dâhil olacaksınız. Bu manganın bir parçası olarak, ömrünüzün geri kalanı boyunca İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı savaşacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Vladaym Tocara, you are hereby found guilty. The court sentences you to a lifetime of penance. You and your associates shall be enlisted in a penal boarding squad operating from my flagship. As part of that squad, you shall fight enemies of Humanity for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın. Vladaym Tocara, suçlu olduğuna hükmediyorum. Mahkeme seni ömür boyu cezaya çarptırıyor. Sen ve takipçilerin, uçsuz gemimde faaliyet gösteren bir cezai bordalama mangasına dâhil olacaksınız. Bu manganın bir parçası olarak, ömrünüzün geri kalanı boyunca İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı savaşacaksınız."
